text: Child's Play 2 is an American horror movie released in 1990. The movie is about a serial killer doll named Chucky that is causing violent terror in Chicago. Brad Dourif plays Chucky. This movie was released in November 1990 across North America. The reviews were mixed. The box office was successful. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:Child's Play movies Category:1990 horror movies Category:1990 thriller movies Category:1990s horror thriller movies Category:1990s serial killer movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:Movies set in factories Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Child's Play 2
